full_transcript: Lumina is designed for the modern executive. We don't just show charts; we show insights. Using Senti-Summary, we take a 50-page business report and condense it into the three points you actually need. It's about 'Zero-Click' reporting for faster decision-making.

segments.text: Lumina is designed for the modern executive. We don't just show charts; we show insights.
segments.speaker: Sales Rep

segments.text: Using Senti-Summary, we take a 50-page business report and condense it into three points.

segments.text: It's about 'Zero-Click' reporting. Lumina is the executive brain for your data cloud.
